amendment.description: Amendment requires a report from the Director of National Intelligence to Congress that would identify and assess various risks in information technology supply chains.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 112-504 to require a report from the Director of National Intelligence that would identify and assess various risks in information technology supply chains.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Myrick amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mrs. Myrick.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Myrick amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
